title: Infested Stone
desc:
Post 1990
- If someone stands on or hits this with a <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card, it breaks, and (1990B) Silverfish enters their hand.
- When placed on the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile, it appears to be (768) Stone. Its true nature is only revealed when it breaks.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 1 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
